title: Helvetica Movie - additonal screenings in Columbus Ohio
content:
Due to popularity, the Wexner Center for the Arts (Columbus, Ohio) has added additonal screenings of the Helvetica movie  
 [http://www.wexarts.org/fv/?eventid=2113](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017054231/http:/www.wexarts.org/fv/?eventid=2113 "http://www.wexarts.org/fv/?eventid=2113")

Tonight Gary Hustwit introduces his film.
author: emel
